word:
Chap. 7 - Co-operation of Ministers and Laymen

          Unitedly Enter the Field of Service 

     Let ministers and lay members go forth into the ripening fields. They will find their harvest wherever they proclaim the forgotten truths of the Bible. They will find those who will accept the truth, and who will devote their lives to winning souls to Christ.--Australian Signs of the Times, Aug. 3, 1903.
